text: Corcelles-sur-Chavornay was a municipality of the Jura-Nord vaudois district in the canton of Vaud in Switzerland. On 1 January 2017 the municipalities of Corcelles-sur-Chavornay and Essert-Pittet joined to become the municipality of Chavornay.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 10 January 2017 == References == Category:Former municipalities of Vaud
title: Corcelles-sur-Chavornay
